title: Glitched Runes
body:
I'm having this issue that whenever I change my rune pages it does nothing at all.

Sometimes my rune pages won't let me save them, and when I remove them it duplicates the runes in the new client. Even using OP.GG it shows that I only have one runepage linked to my account, which makes no sense. I was wondering if anyone else has this problem, and if they do how can you fix it? Because it's really aggravating losing games because of the situations where correct stats matter a whole lot.

replies.body: We're investigating these duplicate display issue with rune pages, so hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for this one.  We'll track the issue and get you fixed up as well.  To help speed things up, rename your impacted runes and let us know what they're called in your ticket.  We'll get back to you!
